overview:
Barry Blomquist is primarily focused on the integration of cutting edge technologies that result in exponential yield benefits to the planet, its peoples, and their pocketbooks.

His interests are varied and broad but carry an underlying commonality of being able to be integrated three dimensionally.

Energy from water, from air, and from dark matter are what makes each day a good day to be alive.

degrees.subject: Political Science, Social Work, Criminal Justice Studies
